page.title: 08GEOG INFORMATION
page.content: Our block lies to the west of{ {ST.HELEN'S.}Occupying the 4 south-west squares is the large country estate of the {EARL of DERBY.} This area is covered with grassland and forest, 3 reservoirs containing drinking water for the people of the district and a {Safari Park}holding a wide variety of animals.In the south east corner there is the dormitory area of St.Helen's called {ECCLESTON {PARK}while another residential area of St.Helen's called {ECCLESTON }lies in the north-eastern square.The rest of the block is farmland.This consists of {DAIRY,ARABLE }and a small amount of { {BEEF PRODUCTION.}Two main roads cross the block.{BURROW'S LANE(B5201)} connects the two communities running N-S and the main road from {LIVERPOOL {to ST.HELEN'S(A 57)}crosses it in the south.
